Item.OrderTitle: access to mental health services: Ten Minute Rule Motion

Text.p: That leave be given to bring in a Bill to provide for establishing maximum waiting times and establishing standards for access to evidence-based psychological therapies for those with mental health problems; and for connected purposes.

Item.OrderTitle: transparency of lobbying, non-party campaigning and trade union administration Bill: committee (day 2)

Text.p: That the draft Occupational and Personal Pension Schemes (Automatic Enrolment) (Amendment) Regulations 2013, which were laid before this House on 1 July, be approved.
Tougher legislation for dangerous dogs (Graham Jones)

Item.DebateTitle: Landfill tax liability at Blanefield Printworks
